data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 21209, Version Hash: 0e9a9eda44de8784629a66474a833187e2651740
data.actual_result: The icon does not change; the maximize icon remains as the displyed icon.
data.expected_result: The maximize icon (two opposing triangles) should change to a plus icon (+) while the option key is held.
data.short_description: Holding option key (⌥) on macOS while hovering over the green "maximize button" does not change it to a plus icon.
data.steps_to_repro: - Hover over the green maximize button in the top-left of the window (next to the red and yellow close and minimize buttons), such that the icons appear - Hold the option (⌥) key while still hovering over the green button
